A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Such waste potential. Rian Johnson has trashed Abram's vision for this trilogy and has left episode IX in shambles that could possibly ruin the franchises future. 
Filled with an unecessary side story\, plot holes\, wrong Luke Skywalker\, discarding of important character backstory\, and no questions answered and just more piled on.

Hopefully Abrams can save this trilogy in episode IX from its doom.
